hero.title: The Complete EdTech
hero.description: Vicerta is the driving force behind the future of education, providing a comprehensive suite of AI-powered solutions that transform how we teach, learn, and manage educational institutions.

videoShowcase.title: See Vicerta in Action
videoShowcase.description: Watch how our AI-powered education ecosystem transforms teaching and learning experiences.

ecertaShowcase.title: Experience the Future of Education
ecertaShowcase.description: Discover how Vicerta transforms traditional teaching methods with cutting-edge technology.

sidebar.testimonial: EasyTeach transforms my lesson planning and saves hours every week!

aiAssistant.title: Virtual Teaching Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get instant help with educational questions, lesson planning, and teaching strategies

quotes.text: You are not just teaching a subject, you are teaching hearts and minds. Your impact reaches far beyond the classroom and into the future of humanity.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every great mind was once taught by someone who believed in them. You are that someone for countless students. Take pride in shaping tomorrow's leaders.
quotes.author: Educational Proverb

quotes.text: Teaching is the profession that creates all other professions. You are the architect of dreams and the builder of futures. Your work matters immensely.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: In a world where you can be anything, be the teacher who inspires, encourages, and believes in every student. You have the power to change lives.
quotes.author: Modern Teaching Wisdom

quotes.text: Your patience plants seeds of knowledge, your wisdom nurtures growth, and your dedication harvests success. You are growing the future, one student at a time.
quotes.author: Educational Philosophy

quotes.text: Behind every successful person is a teacher who saw their potential before they did. You are that beacon of hope and possibility.
quotes.author: Teaching Truth

showcase.platformDescription: Vicerta isn't just a platform - it's the foundation of the new educational era, seamlessly connecting teaching, learning, and administration through intelligent AI.
showcase.consolidatedAIDesc: Our three products share a common AI brain that learns from every interaction across the platform, creating smarter solutions for everyone.
showcase.seamlessIntegrationDesc: All our products work together seamlessly, creating a unified experience from individual teaching to institutional management.
showcase.revolutionaryImpactDesc: We're not just improving education - we're revolutionizing it by creating the first truly integrated AI-powered education ecosystem.
showcase.whyEcerta: Why Vicerta is the Future of Education
showcase.whyEcertaDesc: We're not just building products - we're creating the foundation for the next generation of education technology.
showcase.completeEcosystemDesc: Unlike fragmented solutions, Vicerta provides a unified platform that serves every stakeholder in the education process - from individual teachers to entire institutions.
showcase.exponentialGrowthDesc: Our integrated approach creates exponential benefits. As one product improves, it enhances the entire ecosystem, multiplying value for all users.
showcase.globalTransformationDesc: We're building the infrastructure for global education transformation, connecting educators, students, and institutions worldwide through AI.

passwordReset.resetSent: We've sent password reset instructions to your email address
passwordReset.resetDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
passwordReset.emailSentMessage: If an account with that email exists, you'll receive a password reset link shortly.
passwordReset.checkEmailMessage: Check your email for password reset instructions

feedback.title: How was your experience with {{toolName}}?
feedback.description: Your feedback helps us improve our AI teaching tools. Please take a moment to share your experience! 📚✨
feedback.toolAppreciation: How much did you appreciate this tool overall?
feedback.responseQuality: How would you rate the quality of the generated content?
feedback.missingFields: Were there any fields missing that could have made your request more detailed and accurate?
feedback.missingFieldsPlaceholder: e.g., 'Would love a field for student reading level', 'Missing options for special needs accommodations', etc.
feedback.additionalFeedbackPlaceholder: Share any other thoughts about your experience...
feedback.wouldRecommend: Would you recommend this tool to other educators?
feedback.ratingsRequired: Both star ratings are required to submit your feedback.
feedback.thanksDescription: Your input helps us improve the teaching tools experience.
feedback.errorMessage: There was an issue saving your feedback. Please try again.

lessonPlanGenerator.name: Lesson Plan Generator
lessonPlanGenerator.description: Create comprehensive lesson plans with objectives, activities, and assessments tailored to your grade level and subject.

lessonHookIdeas.name: Lesson Hook Ideas
lessonHookIdeas.description: Generate creative and engaging opening activities to capture student attention at the start of your lesson.

iepGenerator.name: IEP Generator
iepGenerator.description: Create individualized education program goals and accommodations tailored to specific student needs.

learningObjectiveWriter.name: Learning Objective Writer
learningObjectiveWriter.description: Write clear, measurable learning objectives that align with standards and guide instruction.

presentationGenerator.name: Presentation Generator
presentationGenerator.description: Create engaging slide presentations with content, activities, and visual suggestions for your lessons.

academicContentGenerator.name: Academic Content Generator
academicContentGenerator.description: Generate curriculum-aligned content, explanations, and examples for any topic or subject area.

mathSpiralReview.name: Math Spiral Review
mathSpiralReview.description: Create math practice problems that review previously taught concepts alongside new material.

textValidation.name: Text Validation
textValidation.description: Check reading level, complexity, and appropriateness of texts for your target grade level.

multipleExplanationsGenerator.name: Multiple Explanations Generator
multipleExplanationsGenerator.description: Generate different ways to explain the same concept to help diverse learners understand.

generalAssessment.name: General Assessment
generalAssessment.description: Create comprehensive assessments including quizzes, tests, and performance tasks for any subject.

questionStemGenerator.name: Question Stem Generator
questionStemGenerator.description: Generate thought-provoking question stems to deepen student thinking and discussion.

worksheetGenerator.name: Worksheet Generator
worksheetGenerator.description: Create practice worksheets with problems, exercises, and activities for any subject area.

multiStepAssignmentCreator.name: Multi-Step Assignment Creator
multiStepAssignmentCreator.description: Design complex assignments that break down into manageable steps with clear instructions.

dokQuestionsGenerator.name: DOK Questions Generator
dokQuestionsGenerator.description: Create questions at different Depth of Knowledge levels to assess various thinking skills.

quizCreator.name: Quiz Creator
quizCreator.description: Generate quick formative assessment quizzes to check student understanding.

mathProblemGenerator.name: Math Problem Generator
mathProblemGenerator.description: Create custom math problems and word problems for practice or assessment.

aiTextDetector.name: AI Text Detector
aiTextDetector.description: Analyze student text submissions to identify potential AI-generated content and maintain academic integrity.

parentEmailComposer.name: Parent Email Composer
parentEmailComposer.description: Draft professional, warm emails to parents about student progress, concerns, or celebrations.

behaviorPlan.name: Behavior Plan Generator
behaviorPlan.description: Create comprehensive behavior intervention plans with strategies and supports for individual students.

studentGrouping.name: Student Grouping Tool
studentGrouping.description: Generate strategic student groupings for collaborative work, differentiated instruction, and classroom management.
